toolbarControls.description: Boolean flags defining controls for a given widget.
toolbarControls.$comment: So far control components for widgets are implemented with Toggleable Buttons. Model can be extended by adding other complex controls, eg. sets of buttons, dropdown etc.

controlVisible.description: Defines whether control component (eg. Button) is visible.

controlEnabled.description: Defines whether control component (eg. Button) is enabled, ie. can change a state. If not enabled, then  works only as indicator.

fontSize.description: Property defining size of label for Pin.

clearAllPins.description: Property defining whether Button for clearing pins should be visible.

subAnnotationsAvailable.description: Property defining whether pins for subannotations should be visible.
subAnnotationsAvailable.$comment: So far controlVisible/controlEnabled are ignored, since functionality can be set only in widget configuration. There is no control component in frontend to switch on/off.

pinCentering.description: Property defining whether view should be centered on an active pins when navigating forward/backward, or using ROI buttons in Annotation Table
pinCentering.$comment: So far controlVisible/controlEnabled are ignored, since functionality can be set only in widget configuration. There is no control component in frontend to switch on/off.

pinSelectionOnly.description: Optional property defining whether pins are in read-only mode (selection). Default is false. If pins are in selectionOly mode, they cannot be added with mouse left click. This can be useful in situation when pinTool Toggle button is not visible, and tool is on.
pinSelectionOnly.$comment: So far controlVisible/controlEnabled are ignored, since functionality can be set only in widget configuration. There is no control component in frontend to switch on/off.

pinCriterion.description: Single criterion used to constrain visibility of Pins.
pinCriterion.$comment: Can be reorganized in a way that control elements will have their own specific syntax and schema.

controlElement.description: Tool element which state is used to calculate criterion.
controlElement.$comment: So far it is defined for viewer only. In future can be extended for tools, widgets state, etc.

property.description: Property of control element which state is used to calculate criterion. For example viewer['sliceNumber'] can be calculated.
property.$comment: Can be easily extended to other viewer state properties.

operator.$comment: Should be merged with Experiment.schema definitions.

pinConstraints.description: Optional property defining additional conditions for displaying pins. Default is turned off. See example below.
pinConstraints.$comment: So far controlVisible/controlEnabled are ignored, since functionality can be set only in widget configuration. There is no control component in frontend to switch on/off.

projectionRange.description: Optional property defining range of projection, as number of surrounding slices.
projectionRange.$comment: So far controlVisible/controlEnabled are ignored, since functionality can be set only in widget configuration. There is no control component in frontend to switch on/off.

customCursorType.$comment: Custom cursor might have different shape and implementation.

customCursorDiameter.description: Property defining diameter of cursor in millimeters. Size is calculated in image (real world) space.
customCursorDiameter.$comment: This does not have to apply to all of the shapes.

pointerMode.description: Property defining mode (type of interaction) of pointer tool.
pointerMode.$comment: Modes are related to UI event types. There might be possible to define modeOptions in future.

brushSize.description: Property defining size. Can be used to define brush or eraser tool size.

pinToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Pin Tool.

projectionToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Projection Tool.

rangeForKey.description: As in /projectionRange description, with difference that applied only to set range when 'P' key is pressed.

customCursorToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Custom Cursor Tool.

fiducialToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Custom Cursor Tool.

defaultValue.description: Ratio between display and fiducial size. Diameter of fiducial is equal to display width for ratio = 0.5

pointerToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Pointer Tool.

brushToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Brush Tool.
brushToolProperties.$comment: Properties as threshold, colormap LUT, layer are moved out from here.

eraserToolProperties.description: Set of properties for Eraser Tool.

annotationTableProperties.description: Set of properties for annotation table component.

fullTable.description: Property defining whether 'full table mode' should be visible initially. Full table mode shows both 'active row' and full table with annotations.
fullTable.$comment: Control enabled/visible properties define whether full table can be displayed. If they set to false,and defaultValue is false, then full table is not visible.

editableROI.description: Property defining whether rows can be modified/deleted.
editableROI.$comment: If property not defined, default is true. Control visible/enabled defined but not used here.

subAnnotationColumn.description: Property defining whether column to set active roi to generate subannotations with mouse left click should be visible.

csvExport.description: Property defining whether button with CSV Export functionality should be rendered and working.

pointerTool.description: Tool for pointer management. Pointer is changing slices in remaining viewers according to intersection of slices at pointed voxel.

crossHairTool.description: Tool for displaying indication of slices.
crossHairTool.$comment: It can be defined in viewer's interaction schema with a different syntax.

brushTool.description: Tool for drawing in segmentation layer.
brushTool.$comment: TODO Design inputs and widget to handle state of colormap LUT, thresholding intensities when drawing and layers. There will be missing props here!

defaultValue.description: Optional parameter defining whether widget should be on when view is initialised. This can be overwritten by other elements - brushTool, fillingTool, eraserTool are mutually exclusive - only one of them can be on at te same time.

echoTool.description: Widget adding cursor echoes on remaining fields. Widget controls camera too - centering and zooming are projected fro main viewer to others.
echoTool.$comment: Widget works properly only if viewers are set in the same orientation and displaying co-registered images.

eraserTool.description: Tool for erasing in segmentation layer. By default it uses 0 to fill erased voxels.

defaultValue.description: Optional parameter defining whether widget should be on when view is initialised. This can be overwritten by other elements - brushTool, fillingTool, eraserTool are mutually exclusive - only one of them can be on at te same time.

fillingTool.description: Tool for filling in closed shapes in segmentation layer.

defaultValue.description: Optional parameter defining whether widget should be on when view is initialised. This can be overwritten by other elements - brushTool, fillingTool, eraserTool are mutually exclusive - only one of them can be on at te same time.

labelmapUndoRedoTool.description: Widget displaying history controls for segmentation.

pinUndoRedoTool.description: Widget displaying history controls for pins. Save creating, deleting and selecting actions.

labelmapOpacity.description: Widget for control over labelmap opacity.

linkAllTool.description: Widget linking all viewers (slice change is applied to all viewers). Turning on means turning on 'linked' property in all viewers.  It can be implemented with toggleable button or checkbox.

annotationOpacity.description: Widget for control over annotation opacity.

annotationTableTool.description: Widget for control over annotation table component

smoothingAllTool.description: Widget turning on/off smoothing in all viewers. It can be implemented with toggleable button or checkbox.

fiducialTool.description: Widget for responsible for displaying fiducial and modifying behavior of roi navigation. Widget 'on' causes that viewer is centered on image
fiducialTool.$comment: This widget is based on custom cursor.
